entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
